issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Any call to View.add() needs to be replaced with a call to Element._add(). Eventually, the Widget class will be changed from inheriting from View to inheriting directly from Element. Any control that needs to add something to itself internally will break. Before we do this, we need to convert these calls to the universal _add().
fields.summary: MobileWeb: Convert internal use of View.add() calls to Element._add()

comments.body: This was fixed elsewhere and is no longer an issue.
